tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE research_data ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL, 
    date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    soil_moisture FLOAT NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE research_results ( 
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL, 
    date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    productivity_index FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    impact_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE climate_sensors (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 sensor_name TEXT,
 location TEXT,
 temperature FLOAT,
 humidity FLOAT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE crop_data (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 crop_name TEXT,
 yield FLOAT,
 temperature_optimal FLOAT,
 humidity_optimal FLOAT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE research_results (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 research_id TEXT,
 result TEXT,
 interpretation TEXT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE climate_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE agricultural_data (
  farm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_type TEXT,
  yield FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE research_facility (
  facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE research_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  research_date DATE,
  finding TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  installation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE data_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE project_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  affiliation VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE project_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  record_id INT,
  data_description VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES data_records(record_id)
)
